content: <<<http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TB5-Y08qbjo>> >>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TB5-Y08qbjo<< go ahead and put this link into your address bar since we cant have a live link on our posts..this is a video with ron paul on it talking about the swine flu..and how we are being scared into taking the flu shots and last year..we had 1 person actually die from the flu and more people dying from the actual shot..why do something when its not necessary. to me..and this is my point of view....since barrack obama has been elected... WE HAVE HAD ONE SCARE AFTER ANOTHER....WHY IS THAT...IT SEEMS THAT WE ARE LIVING OFF FEAR...ARE WE BEING TESTED SO THAT WHEN SOMETHINGN REALLY COMES ALONG WE WILL NOT THINK MUCH OF IT.. I wonder...so put the link into your address bar and watch it..I hope it works..then sound off on what you think abt it..its a shot for this and a pill for that and look at all the recalls ...we dont hear abt side affects until so many people die especially children..so be careful people... the link takes you to you tube..so you might have to put in swine flu or ron paul ..but listen to it..

title: swine flu....congressmen as doctors

content: quote: this is a video with ron paul on it talking about the swine flu..and how we are being scared into taking the flu shots and last year..we had 1 person actually die from the flu and more people dying from the actual shot..why do something when its not necessary. Did you even watch your own link? He was talking about 1976, not this year. No one is being forced to take shots. The only thing SOME people are taking is tamiflu. And that's only if they have it or if they request it. as for why "WE HAVE HAD ONE SCARE AFTER ANOTHER....WHY IS THAT...IT SEEMS THAT WE ARE LIVING OFF FEAR". We haven't. You just feel that way and it's most likely because you have a mental problem.
quote: this is a video with ron paul on it talking about the swine flu..and how we are being scared into taking the flu shots and last year..we had 1 person actually die from the flu and more people dying from the actual shot..why do something when its not necessary.
reply: Did you even watch your own link? He was talking about 1976, not this year. No one is being forced to take shots. The only thing SOME people are taking is tamiflu. And that's only if they have it or if they request it. as for why "WE HAVE HAD ONE SCARE AFTER ANOTHER....WHY IS THAT...IT SEEMS THAT WE ARE LIVING OFF FEAR". We haven't. You just feel that way and it's most likely because you have a mental problem.
title: swine flu....congressmen as doctors

content: oh I am not hearing lets see...the economic crisis and the flu crisis..yea Im mental and making it up...or your head is in a hole and not seeing this...I did see my own video...and yes it was talking about an earlier time ..and more people died taking the shot then getting the flu...like I said...what news chanel do you watch...thought so..it must be ..left wing side...watch fox news...and pull your head out of the hole...oh the news paper...that must be wrong too...I must be in a dream world...just recently now..they are saying that its not that big a deal...heard our vice president..he wont ride busses...so there is realy no scare at all...like in 1918...oh Im mental...so watch out what I might say...I see things..in newspapers and on the news...Im imagining it..

title: swine flu....congressmen as doctors

content: mouse, your brain must truly be mouse-sized. Every year in the US, about 36 THOUSAND people die of influenza or its complications, and between a quarter and half MILLION people die of it around the world. Per year. You can look it up, go ahead, I'll wait ....... In 1976, when Swine Flu immunizations were offered (note: "offered," not "mandated"), 1 person died of that strain of influenza and 39 died of Guillian-Barre or other complications from the vaccine itself. Deaths from influenza vaccine complications over the past decade? YOU look it up: damn few in the US. I thought your thread title seemed interesting, so stopped to take a look, mostly because I have a serious problem with politicians who are not medical professionals making all sorts of dubious claims about this, that or the other (Chris Dodd and his anti-childhood vaccine campaign is a real irritant, and Tommy Thompson's handling of PR around the anthrax attacks was just plain pathetic). But alas - it's just more lunatic ranting from the uninformed. Oh, and just out of curiosity, why should the VP ride a bus? He has a taxpayer-funded limo, for heaven's sake!

content: oh yohoo....not....I didnt create that spot..i merely saw it..and I do believe that in some vaccines there is danger...they were putting some mercury in them...since all the so called rantings...abt kids having problems with autism...its been taken out...however, i heard recently that some medical clinics are still using vaccine with mercury....i dindt have a problem..but I knew people who did. so just because it didnt happen to you...doesnt mean it doesnt exist...if it happened to your child..believe me..you would be on the bandwagon. Im allergic to so many things that sometimes I have to be tested before surgery. however...I am not scared about the swine flu..I actually was one of the ones who was shot up by teh gov....we all lined up in this gym and they used the gun thing to shoot us up with teh shot and it was the first time ever that it was given...I was lucky...I lived. I think we need to worry more about flying and breathing in air that is recircled from other peoples breaths...tuberculosis...now that is scary...the kind that is mutated and cant be cuted... so ..rant ..rant and more rant...also..Im a mother of 5 kids...raised them all to be healthy and they are adults...had to be on the ball and aware...had many bad doctors...in and out of the military...so...still being aware..
